coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If target has no Burn, inflict 6 Burn
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 Burn
[OnSucceedAttackTail] If target has 10+ Burn, inflict 2 Lust Fragility next turn
[EndSkill] Apply 10% of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and 1 other ally with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
- At 4+ highest Reson., apply it to 1 more ally
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.

[EndSkill] Apply <style="highlight">14%</style> of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and <style="highlight">(1 + (highest Reson. - 2))</style> allies with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
<style="highlight">(max # of other allies that gain [ShieldManagerCryingToad]: 3)</style>
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2<style="highlight"></style>
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.<style="highlight"></style>

[EndSkill] Apply <style="highlight">20%</style> of this unit's max HP as Shield to self and (1 + (highest Reson. - 2)) allies with the least current HP, and apply 2 [ShieldManagerCryingToad] as well
(max # of other allies that gain [ShieldManagerCryingToad]: 3)
- If the affected unit already has [ShieldManagerCryingToad], change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 2<style="highlight"></style>
- At 4+ highest Gloom A-Reson., this Skill's above effects change to 'apply 3 [ShieldManagerCryingToad]' and 'change the [ShieldManagerCryingToad] value to 3' instead.<style="highlight"></style>
